title: 7 Tasty Recipes For Your Next Family Picnic
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
A picnic is a great way to enjoy the outdoors and spend time with family and friends. We’ve put together a list of tasty recipes to try out for your next picnic. Enjoy!


  1. Muffuletta Sandwich

For this recipe you’ll need one loaf of fresh Italian bread, olive oil, grated Parmesan cheese, dried basil, dried oregano, black olices, salami, ham, provolone cheese, and mozzarella cheese.


View the full recipe here.


  1. Lasagna Flatbread

Call it pizza if you’d like, but this lasagna flatbread is lighter but just as yummy. To make this heavenly creation, you’ll need ricotta chese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, one egg, Italian seasoning, sausage, marinara sauce, and flatbread.


View the full recipe here.


  1. Lemon Pie Bars

Satisfy everyone’s sweet tooth with these easy-to-make lemon pie bars. You’ll need all-purpose flour, confectioners’ sugar, butter, eggs, white sugar, lemon juice, and lemon zest.


View the full recipe here.


  1. Classic Egg Salad with Relish

You haven’t had a real egg sandwich until you’ve tasted this recipe from culinary mastermind Geoffrey Zakarian. To make this sandwhich, you’ll need eggs, mayonnaise, chives, sweet pickle relish, Dijon mustard, black pepper, and white sandwhich bread.


View the full recipe here.


  1. Quiche Valerie

If baking is what gets you in the mood for a picnic, then get ready for this hefty ingredient list: all-purpose flour, unsalted butter, sugar, salt, ice water, canola oil, small mushrooms, mixed veggies, eggs, light cream, parsley, thyme, nutmeg, salt, peppercorns, Gruyere cheese, white Cheddar, and Parmigiano-Reggiano. 


View the full recipe here.


  1. Pimiento Cheese Deviled Eggs

Add a classy touch to your family picnic with these Southern-style deviled eggs. The recipe calls for one dozen eggs, ½ cup of mayonnaise, 1 ½ tablespoons of fresh lemon juice, one teaspoon of hot sauce, ½ teaspoon of salt, ⅓ cup of roasted red pepper, 1 ouce of extra-sharp Cheddar cheese, and one scallion.


View the full recipe here.


  1. Creamy Potato Salad

The salad is as beautiful to behold as it is yummy for the tummy! You’ll need quite a few ingredients to put this salad together: red potatoes, salt, black pepper, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, celery, fennel, parsley, tarragon, and eggs.


View the full recipe here.
